channel.title: Control panel help... Please?
channel.description:
[font=courier]I really like the idea of having the control panel that opens when you run your server, but I'd like it to be available for my staff members as well... Is it possible to program the control panel to start up when you run the client, depending on your player rights?
I've thought a lot about this, I can't imagine why it wouldn't work, if it's coded correctly.
Could it not also be coded to run like a client.? You'd run the control panel in a separate file from the server or client you are playing on, and it would 'listen in' on specified ip and/or port, just like a client does.?
I'm probably getting a little ahead of myself and my abilities here, but I'm positive other people as well as myself, want this and would really like it.
Can anyone give me some help? [/font]

item.title: Control panel help... Please?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

possible i could do it but not for some gay 317 server ill prob do for a server thats not leeched + fail

Read full topic

item.title: Control panel help... Please?
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

Possible, although I’d make sure to require some kind of authentication and have it run on a different port so it doesn’t interfere with the main server port.

Read full topic

item.title: Control panel help... Please?
item.dc:creator: @veteran_god_king_ces veteran god: king cesar
item.description:
@veteran_god_king_ces wrote:

[font=courier]I really like the idea of having the control panel that opens when you run your server, but I’d like it to be available for my staff members as well… Is it possible to program the control panel to start up when you run the client, depending on your player rights?

I’ve thought a lot about this, I can’t imagine why it wouldn’t work, if it’s coded correctly.

Could it not also be coded to run like a client.? You’d run the control panel in a separate file from the server or client you are playing on, and it would ‘listen in’ on specified ip and/or port, just like a client does.?

I’m probably getting a little ahead of myself and my abilities here, but I’m positive other people as well as myself, want this and would really like it.

Can anyone give me some help? [/font]
